content: create this beautiful crochet bella beanie with this pattern suitable for all skill levels the bella beanie features a captivating texture that s both stylish and cozy with detailed instructions for baby toddler/child and adult sizes you can easily customize this project to fit anyone grab your size h 5 00 mm crochet hook and medium weight yarn size 4 and begin creating materials - medium weight yarn size 4 i used yarn bee yarn id in blue stone soft shell and dijon - size h 5 00 mm crochet hook - tapestry needle - optional faux fur pom you will need to know how to - front post double_crochet - single_crochet - double_crochet - half_double_crochet - magic_ring
